com.oose2013.group7.roommates.server.network

Class NetworkHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oose2013.group7.roommates.server.network.NetworkHandler

  • public class NetworkHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The Network Handler handles communication with a client. There is one network handler per session. It is the end point of a server.
    Author:
    rujuta

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkHandler

        public NetworkHandler(java.net.Socket socket)
               throws java.io.IOException
        A network handler constructor initializes its member variables:
        Parameters:
        socket - - The socket with which it communicates with the client
        sendingQueue - - The sendingThread waits on the sending queue and sends objects to client as and when the queue is filled
        reader - - The buffered reader to read the input stream
        out - - The Printwriter to write to the output stream The Sending/Receiving functions are handled by two separate threads that are inner classes of this class
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
